morning.title: Pray for church leaders to be faithful
morning.text: Do your best to present yourself to God as one approved, a worker who does not need to be ashamed and who correctly handles the word of truth.

morning.title: Pray for preservation and perseverance
morning.text: To him who is able to keep you from stumbling and to present you before his glorious presence without fault and with great joy…

morning.title: Pray for God's presence
morning.text: And he said,

evening.title: Pray for church leaders to be faithful
evening.text: Do your best to present yourself to God as one approved, a worker who does not need to be ashamed and who correctly handles the word of truth.

evening.title: Pray for preservation and perseverance
evening.text: To him who is able to keep you from stumbling and to present you before his glorious presence without fault and with great joy…

evening.title: Pray for God's presence
evening.text: And he said,

morning.title: Pray for daily bread
morning.text: Give us today our daily bread.

morning.title: Pray to work as unto the Lord
morning.text: Whatever you do, work heartily, as for the Lord and not for men, knowing that from the Lord you will receive the inheritance as your reward.

morning.title: Pray to commit your plans to God
morning.text: Commit your work to the Lord, and your plans will be established.

evening.title: Pray for favour
evening.text: Let the favour of the Lord our God be upon us, and establish the work of our hands upon us; yes, establish the work of our hands!

evening.title: Pray to maintain priorities
evening.text: Seek first the kingdom of God and his righteousness, and all these things will be added to you

evening.title: Pray for confidence and rest
evening.text: Unless the Lord builds the house, those who build it labour in vain... It is in vain that you rise up early and go late to rest, eating the bread of anxious toil.

morning.title: Pray that the gospel would speed ahead and be honored
morning.text: Finally, brothers, pray for us, that the word of the Lord may speed ahead and be honored, as happened among you.

morning.title: Pray for boldness in proclamation
morning.text: [Pray] at all times in the Spirit . . . and also for me, that words may be given to me in opening my mouth boldly to proclaim the mystery of the gospel.

morning.title: Pray for the success of other missionaries
morning.text: I appeal to you, brothers, by our Lord Jesus Christ and by the love of the Spirit, to strive together with me in your prayers to God on my behalf, that I may be delivered from the unbelievers in Judea, and that my service for Jerusalem may be acceptable to the saints.

evening.title: Pray for boldness amidst threats
evening.text: Now, Lord, consider their threats and enable your servants to speak your word with great boldness.

evening.title: Pray to be a living witness
evening.text: You are the light of the world... Let your light shine before others, that they may see your good deeds and glorify your Father in heaven.

evening.title: Pray for those who are persecuted
evening.text: Blessed are those who are persecuted for righteousness' sake, for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.

morning.title: Pray for protection from the evil one
morning.text: Deliver us from evil.

morning.title: Pray for love in the family
morning.text: Therefore, as God's chosen people, holy and dearly loved, clothe yourselves with compassion, kindness, humility, gentleness and patience. Bear with each other and forgive one another... And over all these virtues put on love, which binds them all together in perfect unity.

morning.title: Pray for the needs of family and loved ones to be met
morning.text: And my God will meet all your needs according to the riches of his glory in Christ Jesus

evening.title: Pray that all goes well with loved ones
evening.text: Beloved, I pray that all may go well with you and that you may be in good health, as it goes well with your soul.

evening.title: Pray for the comfort of loved ones
evening.text: The God of all comfort, who comforts us in all our troubles, so that we can comfort those in any trouble with the comfort we ourselves receive from God.

evening.title: Pray for spiritual knowledge for loved ones
evening.text: We continually ask God to fill you with the knowledge of his will through all the wisdom and understanding that the Spirit gives.

morning.title: Pray for local and global peace and prosperity
morning.text: Seek the peace and prosperity of the city to which I have carried you into exile. Pray to the LORD for it, because if it prospers, you too will prosper.

morning.title: Pray for increased righteousness in your nation
morning.text: Righteousness exalts a nation, but sin condemns any people.

morning.title: Pray for fair governance and justice
morning.text: But let justice roll on like a river, righteousness like a never-failing stream!

evening.title: Pray to live at peace with neighbours
evening.text: Live in harmony with one another... If it is possible, as far as it depends on you, live at peace with everyone.

evening.title: Pray for God's influence over leaders
evening.text: In the LORD's hand the king's heart is a stream of water that he channels toward all who please him.

evening.title: Pray for the salvation of nations
evening.text: May God be gracious to us and bless us... so that your ways may be known on earth, your salvation among all nations.

morning.title: Pray to praise God for creation
morning.text: The heavens declare the glory of God; the skies proclaim the work of his hands.

morning.title: Pray for God's will to be done
morning.text: May your kingdom come. May your will be done on earth as it is in heaven.

morning.title: Pray for the global revelation of God's glory
morning.text: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

evening.title: Pray to thank God for creaturely goodness
evening.text: When I consider your heavens, the work of your fingers, the moon and the stars, which you have set in place… Lord, our Lord, how majestic is your name in all the earth!

evening.title: Pray for the renewal of creation
evening.text: Let the heavens rejoice, let the earth be glad; let the sea resound, and all that is in it; let the fields be jubilant, and everything in them; let all the trees of the forest sing for joy.

evening.title: Pray to humbly depend on God
evening.text: Look at the birds of the air; they do not sow or reap or store away in barns, and yet your heavenly Father feeds them… Are you not much more valuable than they?

morning.title: Pray for strategic wisdom
morning.text: If any of you lacks wisdom, let him ask God, who gives generously to all without reproach, and it will be given him.

morning.title: Pray for a mind of discernment
morning.text: And it is my prayer that your love may abound more and more, with knowledge and all discernment, so that you may approve what is excellent, and so be pure and blameless for the day of Christ.

morning.title: Pray for strength and endurance
morning.text: [We have not ceased to pray for you to be] strengthened with all power, according to his glorious might, for all endurance and patience with joy.

evening.title: Pray for peace
evening.text: And the peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.

evening.title: Pray for God's leading
evening.text: Search me, O God, and know my heart; test me and know my thoughts. See if there is any wicked way in me, and lead me in the way everlasting.

evening.title: Pray to seek the Lord
evening.text: One thing I asked of the Lord; this I seek: to live in the house of the Lord all the days of my life, to behold the beauty of the Lord, and to inquire in his temple.

morning.title: Pray to exalt God
morning.text: The Lord is my strength and my song, and he has become my salvation; this is my God, and I will praise him, my father's God, and I will exalt him.

evening.title: Pray to bless the Lord
evening.text: Bless the Lord, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits—who forgives all your iniquities, who heals all your diseases, who redeems your life from the pit, who crowns you with steadfast love and mercy.

morning.title: Pray for repentance
morning.text: Have mercy on me, O God, according to your steadfast love; according to your abundant mercy blot out my transgressions. Wash me thoroughly from my iniquity, and cleanse me from my sin!

evening.title: Pray for mercy
evening.text: God, be merciful to me, a sinner!

morning.title: Pray for Godly meditation
morning.text: Let the words of my mouth and the meditation of my heart be acceptable to you, O Lord, my rock and my redeemer.

evening.title: Pray for Godly meditation
evening.text: Let the words of my mouth and the meditation of my heart be acceptable to you, O Lord, my rock and my redeemer.

morning.title: Pray to overflow with hope
morning.text: May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace as you trust in him, so that you may overflow with hope by the power of the Holy Spirit.

evening.title: Pray to not fall
evening.text: Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling, and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy, to the only wise God our Saviour, be glory and majesty, dominion and power, both now and ever. Amen.
